title: President Mahinda Rajapaksa 3rd most popular leader in Asian-Pacific region.
content: The latest survey carried out by the well known American pollster Gallop Poll in respect of people’s acceptance of the Head of State of their respective country, out of 21 countries in the Asia Pacific Region, President Mahinda Rajapaksa has been ranked in the 3rd position.  The survey says that 91% of the Sri Lankans…
